EmailTemplate.description: Email notification sent to the breach owner on the 12th day.11 days (excluding Sat & Sun) countdown to start from date indicated in 'Breach Owner Allocation Date' field
EmailTemplate.name: 11 days with BO WIP FIELD stage email notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ****BREACH PASSED ITS 11 DAYS DEADLINE*** | Breach Stage: {!Breach__c.Breach_Stage__c} | ATM ID - {!Breach__c.Name}
